gov.nasa.jpf.util

Class LogHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Handler
      • gov.nasa.jpf.util.LogHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogHandler.DefaultConsoleHandler

    public class LogHandler
extends Handler
    log handler class that deals with output selection and formatting. This is the only handler we use for our own logging. We do our own little formatting on the fly
